ch0215_40_lutia/0101_0701_01_10:
Heya, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I was waiting
for you to come!
ch0215_40_lutia/7101_0701_01_10:
Gordie and I were thinking about how to entertain
our fans the other day!
ch0215_40_lutia/7101_0701_02_10: I want my fans to always be smiling!
ch0215_40_lutia/7102_0701_01_10:
I’m turning over a new leaf! Hey, can I tell you
my goal?
ch0215_40_lutia/7102_0701_02_10:
I wanna be a Trainer that’s as charming as
Dashie and Ali!
ch0215_40_lutia/7102_0701_03_10:
In order to bring out my Pokémon’s charm, I have
to be a charming Trainer, too!
ch0215_40_lutia/7103_0701_01_10: I wanna be cool like Roxie and Piers sometimes!
ch0215_40_lutia/7103_0701_02_10:
It’ll be like, “Let’s Show It Off! A Bright
New World!”
ch0215_40_lutia/7104_0701_01_10:
I often imagine who I’d like to team up with as an
idol unit.
ch0215_40_lutia/7104_0701_02_10:
Skyla would share her energy with everyone, or
Whitney could bring smiles to the performance...
ch0215_40_lutia/7104_0701_03_10:
Or maybe Serena, who’s fashionable and shines in
a different way than me?
ch0215_40_lutia/7105_0701_01_10:
I’ve got some fans who call me by the
nickname Lissi!
ch0215_40_lutia/7105_0701_02_10:
If you don’t mind, could you call me Lissi, too,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0215_40_lutia/1701_0701_01_10:
Hey, got a second? I have something I want to
give to you!
ch0215_40_lutia/2501_0701_01_10:
Hey, look at this outfit! It looks like kimono from
Johto! It’s so cute, right?
ch0215_40_lutia/2501_0701_02_10:
I’ve been to other regions for work, but this is the
first time I’ve worn an outfit like this!
ch0215_40_lutia/2501_0702_01_10:
I wanna do loads more work wearing different
kinds of outfits!
ch0215_40_lutia/2501_0702_02_10: I’m an idol! I love cute things!
ch0215_40_lutia/2511_0701_01_10:
Do you know about the traditional way of singing
that’s been around Johto for a long time?
ch0215_40_lutia/2511_0701_02_10:
It’s a very powerful way to sing. Once you
hear it, you’ll want to mimic it!
ch0215_40_lutia/2511_0702_01_10:
The song I listened to was something like,
“I’ll Be at the Olivine Pier! Waiting Forever
for You!”
ch0215_40_lutia/2511_0702_02_10:
The lyrics are about a sad farewell, but it’s
also about moving forward towards the future
with hope.
ch0215_40_lutia/2511_0702_03_10:
I just feel like humming it sometimes! Do you
wanna sing it together?
ch0215_40_lutia/3001_0701_01_10:
Hey, guess what! This morning, I dreamed
I became the number-one Trainer on Pasio!
It felt wonderful!
ch0215_40_lutia/3003_0701_01_10:
As both an idol and a Pokémon Trainer, I’m
always looking to take on new challenges!
ch0215_40_lutia/3005_0701_01_10:
I’ve got some idol work to do tomorrow morning,
so I’d better sleep soon! I hope we both have
sweet dreams!
